channel.title: learn on Elixir
channel.description: Recent content in learn on Elixir

item.title: Resources
item.description: Elixir Resources Elixir is a new programming language. This means that there are less resources to learn it compared to other languages. Below lists some resources that may be helpful. Elixir School Elixir School is a website built by the elixir community. It has articles on all the major features of the language. It also has tutorials for communtiy libraries such as Ecto. This website is helpful if you have a programming background.
